body.name: Handheld Game Console with Classical Retro Single and Multiplayer Games, 3.0 Inch Gameboy Kids Screen Portable Retro Video Game Console Support TV Connection (400 Games)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 1 hr 47 mins
features: Wide range of games: The console includes 800 popular FC games, featuring various genres such as arcade retro games, sports, puzzles, shooting, action, racing, fighting, and adventure games.
Interactive entertainment: Enhance parent-child interaction and enjoy family fun time with the interactive gaming experience provided by the console.
Two-player support: The package includes a gamepad that allows two players to play games together, adding a competitive element to the gaming experience.
TV connectivity: The 3.0-inch LCD screen can be connected to a TV using the AV output, enabling you to enjoy the games on a larger screen for a more immersive experience.

Portable design: The handheld game console is compact and lightweight, making it easy to carry around. It's perfect for playing games on the go, whether you're commuting, traveling, or simply relaxing during your leisure time.

Rechargeable battery: The built-in 800mAh high-capacity rechargeable battery ensures a long gaming session of up to 5 hours on a full charge. This eliminates the worry of running out of power while traveling or camping.

Ideal gift choice: This console makes for an ideal gift for children, boys, girls, and even adults on various occasions such as birthdays or Christmas, bringing joy and entertainment to recipients of all ages.
body.description: Specification: - Item Type: Handheld Game Console - Battery: 1200mah - Size: Approx. 5.7 x 2.76 x 0.79in - Screen: 3.5 inches Package List: 1 x Game Console 1 x AV cable 1 x Charging cable 1 x Manual

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.9 3.9 out of 5 stars 40 ratings 3.9 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I don't know how they cram that many games into such a small device!
reviews.reviewText: It's no "original gameboy", but it holds hundreds of games, plays tetris very well and is certainly worth the small price for anyone who is nostalgic for the handheld games of old! I haven't played with the TV/Screen hookup at all, but I've paid more for a single cable than for this little device with all its accessories

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my son for Christmas. I played with it first to see how it worked before I wrapped it. Very cute very fun. Perfect for any age as a fidget toy and game. I’ll let you know if anything changes lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My grandson loves it he is 7

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Just keep returning them.
reviews.reviewText: This is the second one I’ve returned. They work for a few days then either the screen stops coming on, or they won’t charge. Pretty much just cheap junk. I’ll say the games are great when you can get it to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is amazing and so cool in verity of games.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not sure why there’s a remote control….
reviews.reviewText: Device is great except we can’t work out how to use the remote control that came with it. Instructions aren’t terribly helpful either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Make sure to charge it when you get it!
reviews.reviewText: My kids love this thing, but we almost returned it in the beginning. It would turn on for a few seconds, then fade to a black screen. That's because we didn't plug it in first.Once it's charged, it looks pretty good! And tons of games. Like most these knock off things, a lot of weird ones. But for that price, just having Mario and Mario 3 is worth it.It's not as fancy as the real deal, but not having cartridges is really nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
